response.original_title: A Stolen Life: The Sasha Leigh Crook Story
response.overview: In July of 2003 8yearold Sasha Leigh Crook stayed with her grandparents for the winter school holidays On July 6th her grandparents planned to take her to a birthday party where her mother Michelle would meet them Excited about the party the little girl played in the front garden but when it was time to leave Sasha Leigh was nowhere to be found This is her tragic story.
response.title: A Stolen Life: The Sasha Leigh Crook Story
